name: Energy Weapons Training
description: Training in forming and utilizing psionic energy-based weaponry for combat scenarios.

cards.title: Manifesting Energy Weapons
cards.description: Methods to shape energy into structured weaponry for combat use.
cards.bulletpoints: Energy Flow Control, Construct Stability, Weapon Refinement

cards.title: Tactical Applications of Energy Weapons
cards.description: Strategies for utilizing energy weapons in dynamic combat scenarios.
cards.bulletpoints: Defensive Maneuvers, Long-Range Attacks, Psionic Countermeasures
